page.title: 09Cromford Carnival
page.content: On Carnival Day it is quite a festival. The fair comes for three nights and opens on Carnival Day itself.Bands come from all over to lead the procession. There are decorated floats, fancy dress princesses, page boys and of course a Carnival Queen. The procession walks down from Dene Quarry to Cromford Meadows, where all the events take place. A typical year's events are a Band Contest, Children's Races, various stalls a Marathan, a Tug of War just fun and games like drunken wheelbarrow and pram races. Future plans are for a Duck race and Amber Valley Gymnastic Display Team. They finish with a torch_light procession.
